entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -6.7°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %

Dewpoint: -10.0°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
